channel.title: How to make the server online
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm currently new to MoparScape and when I try to make a server it says my server is offline but how do I make it online, I saw no option for that, like when I'm on the register a server page it says the rules are u cant make a server if its offline but how do i make it online everytime i try and register it says ur server is offline

item.title: How to make the server online
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you have to open ports TCP 43594 or 43594 or both on your router

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the server online

item.title: How to make the server online
item.dc:creator: @Compulsion Compulsion
item.description:
@Compulsion wrote:

Have you gotten your server up?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the server online
